thread.title: Should you buy the new iPhone?
thread.title_full: Should you buy the new iPhone?

title: Should you buy the new iPhone?
text:
Should you buy the new iPhone? HARRY TUCKER news.com.au Should you buy the new iPhone? HARRY TUCKER news.com.au The new Rose Gold colour is expected to be popular. 
IN the very early hours of this morning Apple announced its two new phones for 2015, the iPhone 6s and the iPhone 6s Plus. 
Theyâ€™re a pricey pair, too. Starting at $1079 for the 16GB iPhone 6s and $1229 for the 16GB iPhone 6s Plus. Is it worth the money? Should you upgrade your current iPhone or are there better Android alternatives? We look at the big three areas where the new iPhones have been upgraded. 
Design and screen
